✟ The test God has allowed in your life now may one day become your "test"imony.
Our Passion Is Fashion™ Christian Boutique   https://ourpassionisfashion.org/

The primary mission at Our Passion Is Fashion™ is to express our passion for Christ and lead others to salvation and a lifelong pursuit of Jesus Christ. At the cornerstone of our faith-based brand of clothing and products is a set of core values and guiding principles founded on Christ's atoning death on the cross and His resurrection. We are committed to creating and delivering a family brand of apparel and products that are unique, inspiring, and designed to spread the Word of God and have an encouraging impact on the lives of our associates, customers, and the communities we serve. Our Passion Is Fashion™ is dedicated to operating predominately as a ministry by utilizing faith-based apparel and products to evangelize the Word of God. “He said to them, ‘Go into all the world and preach the gospel to all creation.’” – Mark 16:15

Advance effective Sales and Business Development strategies to include Sales, Marketing, Advertising, and Social Media design and implementation. Created several "S", "C", "LLC", and online companies to develop synergy and  integrate Business Development plans to attain revenue and profitability objectives.Create business plans, strategies, and tactics to fully integrate an organization's sales, marketing, advertising, and brand management efforts. Increase profitability by expanding market share through: the integration of sales,marketing, and advertising design and implementation; creating new and existing product promotions; and identifying relevant market opportunities.
Founder and CEO of DailyOffertunity Online Retail

DailyOffertunity recently completed negotiations and finalized an agreement for acquisition. As a result, we will no longer be in a position to continue operations. We want to take this "Offertunity" to thank all of you for the loyalty and support that made this acquisition possible. DailyOffertunity was "born" and introduced to the public for the first time on Christmas Day, 2010. DailyOffertunity was the world's first and largest Christian-based website promoting merchant offers with discounts of up to 90% on unique products and services to its members. DailyOffertunity donated 10% of their proceeds to the ministry or charity of the consumer's choice.
Franchise Owner and Entrepreneur, Multiple RSVP Markets

Responsible for the creation, development, and ongoing operation of several markets within the RSVP Publication Franchise. RSVP is a leader within the Direct Mail market and derives the majority of their revenue from custom designed postcards.
Baxter International Inc., BioSurface Technology, Samaritan Home Health

Comprehensive experience in a variety of positions as a Sales Representative; Sales and Marketing Manager; Contract Development Manager; Regional Sales and Operations Director. and Business Development Executive.
